title: The Christmas Spirit | 12/24/20
description:
The host of NewsRadio Wood in Grand Rapids Michigan, Justin Barclay, fills in today for the special edition, Christmas Eve, Glenn Beck Program. 2020 was a year of revelation in so many ways, especially in government. Justin shares a few personal stories of his past holiday seasons, fatherhood, among others. Justin welcomes Michigan Attorney, Matt Deperno, to the show to discuss voter fraud across the state of Michigan. Justin also welcomes Kevin DeVries to the show to share a wild, powerful story of something that happened to him.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
